Replace.Text: Director of the Rhine Department of Life Ecology and an expert in the field of life sciences and environmental science in Colombia, contacted Rhode Island during the Trimont incident, and later signed long-term cooperation clauses with Rhode Island, carried out a number of joint scientific research projects with the Bioengineering Research Institute, and participated in related combat missions as a pioneer operator.
I will definitely save the gift you give me well. In return, let’s go to the theater together.

If Christen was here, she would definitely stay away from the crowd and look up at the stars on that balcony... No one understands her, just as no one can fully understand my difficulties. What about you, Doctor, what kind of person are you, and what kind of pain is there in your heart?
People will change, what will I become?
Let grudges flow with the water.
The road seems to be difficult to walk, be careful and don’t fall.
The dew will be evaporated and everything will disappear. Do I still have the chance to see rain falling from the sky and reunite with my compatriots to recognize the Prime Minister?
Rhine Life, Director of Ecology, Muirsseth. But we shouldn't need such formal greetings between us, Doctor. After all, we have long been friends.
The dew drips on the leaves, but it can only be dried by the sun. How much do we want to blend into the leaf veins and return to the earth... Well, I mean dew, dew wants-ah, um...ah...
Let's chat before you start working.

Do you still want to go to the office during the holidays? Even the hardest-working researcher in Rhine will not go to the laboratory today. If you have to walk into that door, I will...ah, I'll pour you a cup of coffee...
Everyone says you are careful... Does it hurt?
Let grudges flow with the water.
Muirsseth likes to maintain peace civilization

Ecology is to fill in soil and put some animals and plants in it, study the cyclical relationship between individual species and population groups in detail, and improve or create new ecosystems through research and innovation... You seem to know it very well, and your expression is not adorable at all. Forget it, let's change the topic.
Trouble, trouble, let's deal with it as soon as possible.
Do you mean, give me the right to decide on working hours and itineraries? That means, you have to do whatever I write in the memorandum, Doctor. Oh, it's too late to regret now, huh ~

My population has no future, so I can only hope that the past will give us answers. You are from the past, Doctor, you are me, our hope. But even without this relationship, you are still the one who pulls me out of the bubble, and you still hold my hand. How can I let go? .
It is not a good habit to be distracted at work.
There is really nothing new on the earth.
The sun is a little hot, so I'll take a break first.
Now is not the time to ask for good questions.

Are your lips a little dry? ...It seems that it is still peeling, so you must drink more water normally. Alas, I’ll give you my lip balm, and I’ll buy one and give it back to me later. I only use this brand of mint flavor, so don't buy the wrong one, okay?
If there is still something that bothers you, throw it aside first and try this "Orange Storm".
Using the Rhine Life Civilization led by Muirsseth.
When finished, you get a small amount of [ICON_science] technology value, [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist points and a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka.

When completed, you will get a small amount of [ICON_science] technology value, [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist points and a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. Each round of "Exoplanet Exploration" accelerates by 1 light year.
The city with Rhine headquarters gives the production of the unit +25% experience gained.
Select to restore one round when located or adjacent "planetary debris" to fully recover during this period.

It will not be restrained by melee units. It will be -10[ICON_strength] combat power when attacking, and +15[ICON_strength] combat power when defense. At the beginning and end of the round, it causes 5 [ICON_damaged] damage to enemies and buildings around you, and can also trigger this effect when you are attacked by melee. Not subject to regional control.
+5 will not be restrained by melee units
There is no debuffer of any movement force, and it can enter the water cell initially. Not subject to regional control.
Selfish. traitor. Those who seek the truth. The lone walker. Pioneer. Good night, Terra. [NEWLINE]—Christen
The enemy forces in two cells of planetary crumbs -5 combat power
No maintenance fees or resources are required.
It seems that it will become your cute girlfriend?
I really like a peaceful civilization and hate a civilization in war.

Scientific research pioneer: [NEWLINE] Diplomatic visibility +1, [ICON_influenceperturn] influence points +5, [ICON_favor] Diplomatic support +1. Each encounter with a city-state will have a +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity. [NEWLINE][ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka offers an additional 10% technology. [NEWLINE]

Elves: [NEWLINE] Create a city to get an additional 2 territories. [ICON_capital]City housing within the 6th ring of the capital city +3, each [ICON_citizen] population provides +1 [ICON_gold] gold coins, +1 [ICON_production] productivity, and all output +5%, an additional +5% for each new player era you enter. Other cities output -50%. [NEWLINE] Director of Ecology Department: [NEWLINE] The beginning shows all strategic resources. Each cell in the country receives a random buff when it is improved for the first time. The city will receive a bonus based on the number of resources they own [NEWLINE]

Elves: [NEWLINE] Create a city to get an additional 2 territories. [ICON_capital]City housing within the 6th ring of the capital city +3, each [ICON_citizen] population provides +1 [ICON_gold] gold coins, +1 [ICON_production] productivity, and all output +5%, an additional +5% for each new player era you enter. Other cities output -50%. [NEWLINE] Director of Ecology Department: [NEWLINE] The beginning shows all strategic resources. When each cell in the country is improved for the first time, a random buff is obtained: [NEWLINE] A 40% probability of obtaining gold coins equivalent to the current technology value; a 40% probability of obtaining a cultural value equivalent to 50% of the current technology value; a 10% probability of obtaining an messenger; a 5% probability of obtaining a "crossroad" that does not require maintenance fees and iron; a 5% probability of obtaining a "crossroad" for free in the city center; a 5% probability of obtaining a pioneer without population. [NEWLINE]Cities will receive bonuses based on the number of resources they own (plus, luxury, strategy): [NEWLINE] Increase revenue and reduce expenditure (there are 0 types): Rhine headquarters and ecological park can release cultural bombs. [NEWLINE] Gradually moisturized (there are 1 types): On the basis of increasing revenue and reducing expenditure, the city can build an additional area. [NEWLINE]Ecological coupling (there are 2 types): On the basis of progressive emulsion, the city's loyalty will always be full. [NEWLINE]Shallow non-entropy adaptation (there are 3 types): Based on ecological coupling, the gain effect of "sprite" is automatically obtained without debuffing [NEWLINE]

Rhine Life Specialty College area, construction cost +20% and maintenance cost +100%. For each ICON_GreatScientist big scientist you get, the region produces an additional 1 [ICON_Science] technology; for each other civilization you get, the region produces an additional 1 [ICON_GreatScientist big scientist you get. [NEWLINE] The Rhine headquarters and its buildings will automatically receive all expert bonuses without the [ICON_citizen] population, and the expert bonus will be extra +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points. Can perform 1-cell range city attacks. The city with Rhine headquarters makes the "crossroads" of production gained +25% [ICON_promotion] experience. [NEWLINE] Unlock the special project "Good night, Christen". After unlocking the alien mission, you can carry out a more powerful project "Good night, Christen²". [NEWLINE]

Muirses's special features are improved. It cannot be adjacent to another ecological park. [NEWLINE]Each adjacent strategic resource +1 [ICON_production] productivity, +1 [ICON_Science] technology; each adjacent luxury resource +1 [ICON_culture] culture, +1 [ICON_gold] gold coins; every adjacent bonus resource +1 [ICON_food] food, +1 [ICON_faith]faith[NEWLINE]

The Rhine life-specific wonder must be built on the plains of the adjacent Rhine headquarters. After completion, the ongoing technology and municipal affairs will be completed immediately. The country produces a maximum scientist point per round of [ICON_GreatScientist] +25%, and makes the country's productivity +25% when conducting space race projects. "Crossroad" is located or adjacent to "Planetary debris when it chooses to restore for one round, which can be fully restored during this period; the enemy forces in two grids around planetary debris -5[ICON_strength] force, -1[ICON_movement] movement speed [NEWLINE]

Rhine Life-style anti-cavalry unit, replaces gun stabs and shooting phalanxes, maintenance cost +100%, and requires iron production and maintenance. [NEWLINE] will not be restrained by melee units, -10 [ICON_strength] force when attacking but +15 [ICON_strength] force when defense. At the beginning and end of the round, it causes 5 [ICON_damaged] damage to enemies and buildings around you, and can also trigger this effect when you are attacked by melee. Not controlled by region[NEWLINE]

Muirses' characteristic investigation unit. Get a manifold for free at the beginning, but the maximum number of manifolds on the field cannot exceed 5. [NEWLINE]+1[ICON_movement]mobile force, with a little [ICON_charges] labor to improve resources, the upgrade tree is different. It will not be subject to any [ICON_movement] movement force debuffs and can enter the water cell initially. Not subject to regional control. [NEWLINE]
